Gaborone Town Hall/ 3rd, 4th, & 5th December/8 pm (doors open 7:30), Tickets P3.00 children P2.00 P.S. Admission by ticket only - Available at the Coop. Gaborone Mall Medu Art Ensemble. Title: The emancipation of women is not an act of charity, the result of a humanitarian or compassionate attitude.
Description.note: The emancipation of women is not an act of charity, the result of a humanitarian or compassionate attitude. The liberation of women is a fundamental necessity of the Revolution, the guarantee of its continuity and the precondition of its victory. The main objective of the Revolution is to destroy the system of exploitation and build a new society which releases the potentialities of human beings, reconciling them with labour and with nature. This is the context within which the question of womens' emancipation arises
Name.creator: Medu Art Ensemble
